attributes.action: Rylan Clark is a joke, please get him off the X Factor
attributes.additional_details: I am writing in regarding a singer on the X Factor who goes by the name of Rylan Clark. He cannot sing and he is a joke to the public. He has been in the bottom 2 twice and each time has been saved by the public vote. This has to stop, no one likes him, he is a joke to the public. There are singers 100 times better than him being kicked off the show because of his stupid perfomances. Please get him off. Thank you
